author: {'steamid': '76561198243936698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1511639274}
review:
This was a cute one, and well done.

For me, it was hard to get used to the physics for some reason. Some jumps I would take differently every time because I couldn't figure out where I'd land. I don't think that's necessarily a fault of the game, but felt like mentioning it.

The menu was simple but a little odd. The farther you make it, the more past levels add up of course. so when selecting "start" it scrolls through all of them until reaching the one to resume from.

As for recommendations, if you have patience and like this type of game, absolutely. If it's not your type but are curious, it's a good intro to it.

Definitely should be said it's free to play, and with that, it's good at what it does and worth a play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117182473', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1511640220}
review:
Интересная и красочная игра про маленькую капельку, которая путешествует по дому, по саду и по крышам дома, встречая на пути препятствия, которые и должен побороть игрок. Несмотря на очаровательность и мультяшность, игра представляет из себя зародыша Cuphead, встречая нас довольно сложными уровнями. И пусть до гигантов жанра "убейся-об-клавиатуру-и-начни-сначала" ей ещё далеко, для бесплатной игры она довольно хороша. 

Игра довольно короткая, получить 99% достижений нужно просто пройдя игру. Самым сложным является последнее достижение, для которого нужно собрать все токены. Я лично не настолько хардкорный чувак. А вы?

author: {'steamid': '76561198354072245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1712324756}
review:
This game, free to play (or £1.99 for deluxe) is completely worth either price. Although my hours played is not the longest (thanks, offline mode) and my progress was not the quickest, I am constantly drawn back to the beautifully simple graphics and often-haunting music. I recently nominated 'Drop Alive' for a Steam Award, and the only problem was deciding which one to choose it for. In the end, "The World Is Grim Enough Let's Just All Get Along" Award was the only option, despite the many hours I have invested relaxing in this wonderful game. The levels and map design match up to the quality of the ambiance and simple controls.

Thank you and congratulations on an upcoming 1st anniversary, Invi Games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997901318', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1509380854}
review:
Я совершенно не понимаю логику разработчика не включать чекпойнты в эту "прекрасную" игру. Прохождение одних и тех же мест заново, когда тебе предстоит повторять одни и те же действия из-за 1 "ошибки", которую допустил на половине уровня - это просто самое ужасное, что можно было сделать. Сама игра платформер как платформер, ничего выдающегося нет. Все эти действия и поведение жидкости уже были опробованы в Gish'e, тут это все выглядит вторично. Музыка заунывная, озвучка капли малоприятная. 
Единственный однозначный плюс этой игры - картинка, исключая некоторую размытость многих поверхностей, по которым предстоит передвигаться.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182183978', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1507817910}
review:
If you have one hour of time to spare and want to play a really nice game, then please play Drop Alive. This game has everything you wish for a platformer to have. It's freaking adorable, has levels that are extremely different from each other and most of all it has a fun way it plays with difficulty.

Because of a recently hyped game I was on the look out for some free platformers that have a nice difficulty to it and found this game. The first few levels were really easy after getting the hang of the mechanics making the start really fun. After those first few easier levels things changed quite a lot. Playing through a level took several amounts of tries to finish but eventually everything worked much easier after finding the easy path. The game has in various levels different paths that lead to the goal. One of them is easier but less obvious, the other is more obvious but way harder to clear. This makes the game really fun for every sort of gamer.

On top of that what made me lose my heart to this adorable game the most was the art. The cute eyes of the droplet just make you fall in love instantly. Similar to how the really cute and fun artstyle of the background and obstacles just make you stare at everything in disbelief on how these cute looking cookies could eventually end up killing your droplet. 

It might just be my love for platformers in general but Drop Alive is one of the most adorable platformers I played and will probably have a special spot in my heart until the end of time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970733924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1490465499}
review: 'Drop Alive' is a fun platformer game which takes place in the life of a water droplet traversing different obstacles in a regular household. The main objective is to complete each level by utilizing time management, strategy as well as skill in order to get the achievement at the end of each one. All levels in the game build off the previous one by transitioning from one area in the house to the other, which require more intuition and skill to beat. Overall, I recommend it to any platformer lover and achievement hunter, as the ones in the game are relatively easy to obtain, save the last one. In addition to that, the game is free, so that is definitely an added bonus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198263707823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1507384051}
review:
İndirmeye ve oynamaya değer bir oyun.

Artıları : 
- Ücretsiz ve az yer kaplayan bir oyun.
- Hikayesi fena değil, sıradan bir platform oyunu.
- Farklı bir oyun deneyimlemiş oluyorsunuz. 1-2 saatiniz hoş geçer

Eksiler : 
- Dediğim gibi 1-2 saatiniz hoş geçer ancak sonrasında sıkılmaya başlıyorsunuz.
- Checkpoint yok. İlk bölümler kolay, checkpointe gerek olmuyor ama son bölümler oyun gerçekten zorlaşmaya başlıyor. Ölüp en başa dönmek bırakma isteği uyandırıyor. Oyundaki tek eksiklik checkpoint olmaması.

author: {'steamid': '76561198366333758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1507857824}
review:
Very cute game! Short, endearing, and left me with a good impression and warm memories unlike many free platformers. 

There are a few glitches here and there, most noticeably a glitch where the game doesn't properly register some of the collectable golden drops. I think two of the golden drops in the penultimate level are the culprit. Replaying that level twice to pick up the functional golden drop again (the one in the chimney, as far as I could tell) got me the Treasure Hunter achievement and the last skin! 

There is also a small glitch where, if the player moves a bit too much at the beginning of that same level when first gaining control, the water drop will get stuck under the level, forcing one to exit the level or wait for the drop to pop. Easily worked around, but I was very confused the first time it happened! 

Those few words of caution aside, this game is adorable and was definitely worth the time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040527801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 224, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1505066388}

author: {'steamid': '76561198132789590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1504701216}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198095413985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1504313929}
review:
just its fun for a free try but not fun to complete 

pros
>free
>drawn
>platformer

cons
<large hit box for flames
<bad overall level design 
<the gameplay gets old after a level 

After completing this game I can say that if this was bread it would be stale and expired by 2009 sure its free and I appreciate its creative design but it's just a sluggish platformer.  The overall feel is okay until you realize there isn't anything original with the game sure ohh your water but the water ball is basicly kirby and the world is copying of an odd mix of little big planet and limbo with whiffs of super meat boy. Sure the water air ice premise is nice however it does more harm than good by limiting the player's exploration and expression through the game most ofthe time you're stuck as a water droplet and the ice and gas are tossed in as gimmicks

author: {'steamid': '76561198170818613', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1504805515}
review:
Sehr sehr liebevolles kleines Game  ^^
Der Grafikstil ist herzergreifend süß und die Musik passt gut zur Stimmung.

Das einzigste Manko was ich jetzt bei dem Spiel gefunden habe, ist dass es leider in den Levels keine Checkpoints gibt.
Sprich wenn man irgendwo auf dem Weg stirbt...muss man leider von gaaaaaaanz vorne anfangen.
Also wer schnell in Rage gerät, sollte lieber die Finger hier von lassen.

Viel Spielzeit bietet es nicht unbedingt, aber für zwischendurch oder wenn mal wieder das Internet weg ist, ist es perfekt!

author: {'steamid': '76561198407401252', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1504464369}
review: For a free game, I was really impressed with this. The music, the artwork, the gameplay, the mission of one little drop of water against the world... I love it all. Also, the realistic aspect that bread dries you out really appeals to me.

review:
Hands down one of the best games in my Library. Easily would pay for this if had a bit more polish. That said I'm looking forward to more things from this developer. Chances are if it looks interesting to you, give it a shot you are more than likely going to enjoy it. Past that it's free so even if you don't just uninstall it and no hassle has been had.

I'd give a proper review for more than that but honestly this is a game you have to experience to really get a feel for it. It's more than what it looks like.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1502621496}
review:
자연을 향한 물방울의 모험.
덩치가 크든 작든 물방울은 물방울. 손대면 톡! 하고 터지는 녀석....

물방울이 창문 밖의 자연을 동경하며 탈출을 시도하는 게임입니다.
식탁, 하수구, 지붕 등의 다양한 지역을 돌아다니면서 위험한 요소들을 피해서 나아가야 하죠.
물방울은 시간이 지남에 따라 몸을 구성하는 수분이 증발해 점점 부피가 작아지며,
이때는 어딘가에서 떨어지는 물을 받아 보충해 다시 몸집을 키워야합니다.

다양한 오브젝트들과 상호작용하여 위험에 빠지기도, 도움을 받기도 합니다.
날카로운 가시의 경우, 고정되거나 나타났다 사라졌다 등장하며 옆 면은 피해가 없지만 윗 부분은 펑! 하고 터집니다.
불의 경우, 직접적으로 닿으면 연기가 되어 사라지지만, 뜨거워진 배수관 등에 닿으면 수증기가 됩니다.
수증기 상태가 되면 공중을 날아다니고, 스페이스바로 잠시 아래로 내려갔다 떠오를 수 있죠.
전류의 경우에는 직접적으로 닿으면 역시 소멸되며, 전선을 타고 흐르는 경우에는 몸집이 줄어듭니다.

차가운 오브젝트와 닿으면 액체에서 얼음이 되며, 가시나 전기 등에 충돌되도 피해없이 달려갈 수 있습니다.
또한, 앞을 막는 얇은 벽들을 파괴하면서 달려갈 수 있죠. 물에 닿으면 다시 액체화.
빵이나 스펀지 등에 닿으면 몸의 수분이 점점 빨려들어 부피가 줄어들며,
일부 구간에서는 독성이 있는 액체가 흘러 위협을 주기도 합니다.

아쉬운 점
-체크 포인트 없음. 실수하면 해당 레벨 처음부터 다시.(오히려 도전 욕구를 자극하기도
-여러 요소들에 대한 설명 부족(일단 당해보고 알아보는 방식
-어렵다(이건 문제가 되지 않음

review:
За приятной графикой и красивым саундтреком стоит весьма корявое управление и некоторая сложность, так как умирать вам прийдется довольно часто, сейвов здесь нет, прийдется начинать уровень заново, от чего лично у меня жутко бомбит!
Не хочу показаться занудой, но какого хрена вода умирает от электричества?!, должен происходить электролиз или на худой конец испарение! А шипы?! Как вода может испариться наткнувшись на шипы да еще и под дождем?! Вакханалия!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198075758240', 'num_games_owned': 723, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1501547529}
review:
[h1]Best free game i've played on Steam! 	[/h1]

In Fact, it never felt like i was playing some free cheap game.

The difficulty is fun, i died quite a few time i was expecting some casual kid game lol, the music fit well with the hand drawn art, the concept of water drop is simple but well executed, it can transform into ice or vapor. Only real problem is the gameplay in ice form is a bit stiff but you feel like you heavy so its kind of neat.

Try this if you wanna 100% a quality free game :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198290445268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 342, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1501384282}
review:
A proposta do jogo é bem interessante e inusitada, você controla uma gota d'água percorrendo vários locais de uma casa. 
Drop Alive é um jogo simples e bonito de plataforma 2D, porém é curto e fácil. Algumas pessoas criticam a falta de um checkpoint, porém acredito que não colocar um checkpoint dentro das fases foi uma decisão correta, por que isso teria encurtado o desafio do jogo.
No geral é um excelente jogo, vale a pena conferir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268065330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1501309635}
review: Un petit jeu de plate-forme fort sympathique (quoiqu'un peu frustrant par moment à cause d'une difficulté assez aléatoire) qui charme avec son univers visuel attachant et son ambiance au combien poétique. C'est joli et plaisant à jouer. Comme quoi, un jeu gratuit tournant autour d'une simple goutte d'eau (gameplay d'ailleurs adapté au personnage) peut s'avérer être de bonne facture !

author: {'steamid': '76561197996681866', 'num_games_owned': 738, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1498551722}
review:
Drop Alive is OK. The concept is good but the poor mechanics were rage inducing. 

[h1]Positive:[/h1]
- Visuals and music are nice.
- I really like the concept of this game. You're a water droplet that is slowly reducing in size. Water will bring you back to normal size, and the environment can change your form (steam/ice). It's simple, but clever.

[h1]Negative:[/h1]
- My main issue with this game are the controls. It feels sluggish and sometimes unresponsive, making precision jumping more difficult than it should be. 
- Vertical movement when you are in steam form is annoying. You cannot move up faster, but you can press down (which moves you down a fixed distance). Every time you press down, you lose size, speeding up your death. If you pair this with the timing of the fire streams, it becomes a recipe for rage. 
- Death is punishing. You start at the beginning of the level and must recollect any tokens you previously found. I usually don't consider this a negative aspect (games should be challenging), but the poor controls and unclear hitbox make deaths quite frustrating. 
- The last two levels are long and frustrating to complete (especially if you want to collect all tokens). I found myself raging quite a bit in the process. 
- I encountered a glitch where some of my collected tokens randomly disappeared in the level selection screen. Although I had collected some tokens (and completed the level) it did not register. I had to replay some levels to get the achievement.

[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]
Drop Alive is not bad, but it's not very well polished either. I wish there was a neutral recommendation option. In its current state, I cannot recommend this game. The concept for the game is really great but the execution is somewhat disappointing. The most important aspect of any 2D platformer is the movement controls, which is sometimes lacking in this game. Thankfully it's a fairly short game and it's also free.

[/tr]

author: {'steamid': '76561198021991957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1577554389}
review:
Nem is tudom, hogy kezdjem el az értékelésemet. A játék nagyon aranyos, egy kis vízcseppel kell végigmennünk a házon át, lényegében a ház minden részét bebarangoljuk : éléskamra, hűtőszekrény, gáztűzhely, televízió (vagy valamilyen hasonló elektromos berendezés, lehet rosszul emlékszem és nem tévé), mosogató stb. hogy elérjük a szabadságot ami a házon túl lakozik. A víz mind a három halmazállapotát használnunk kell, hogy átverekedjük magunkat a temérdek akadályon keresztül amit elénk fektettek. A játék alapvetően nagyon szépen meg van rajzolva, de amikor a mosogatógép lefolyójába alámerülünk akkor nagyon sok undorító ételmaradékot láthatunk, amik nagyjából úgy néznek ki mintha szarcsimbókok lennének. Ez elég undorító, főleg egy játéknál amit szerintem 6-7 éves gyerekeknek készítettek. Szarcsimbók ide vagy oda, őszinte leszek veletek : szerintem ez az a játék ami legjobban felidegesített az összes játék közül amikkel valaha játszottam, eddigi életem alatt nem találkoztam még egy ilyen programmal ami ennyire felhúzott. És ezt is csak egy dolognak köszönheti : nincsen mentési lehetőség vagy mentési pont a játékban!. Írtózatosan sokszor el fogja bukni a játékos a pályákat. A pályák a játék elején még viszonylag könnyűek, az első 2-3 pálya maximum egy perc hosszú lehet fejenként és ha ott elölről kell kezdened fel se fog tűnni, mert másodszorra vagy harmadszorra ígyis-úgyis megcsinálod. A problémák akkor kezdődnek, amikor a pályák ilyen ötperces hosszúságúak. Nemcsak hosszabbak mint korábban, de sokkal több akadály van benne. Átverekeded magad az első ötön és a hatodiknál véletlenül rossz gombot nyomsz és konyec. Meghalsz, úgy hogy pl: a pálya 85%-át teljesítetted és már csak 15 volt hátra. Ilyenkor mi a teendő? Kezdheted újra az egészet. A tizedik próbálkozás után már kezdesz ingerült, dühös lenni, de a huszadik után már törnél-zúznál. Egy másik játékos értékelésében olvastam, hogy ő már annyira pipa volt, hogy majdnem szétverte a kontrollert. Ha én kontrollerrel játszottam volna ugyanúgy éreztem volna mint ő, de én billentyűzetet használok. Az ötvenedik próbálkozásnál már az egekben volt a vérnyomásom, pedig egy erős idegzetű ember vagyok, CSGO-ban nem baszták fel ennyire az idegeimet mint ebben a "játékban". A vasidegeim szépen lassan felmondták a szolgálatot. Ez a játék egy kínzással ért fel a számomra, nagyon nem sokon múlott, hogy bevegyek valamilyen gyógyszert miatta. Sokkal rosszabb játékok nem idegesítettek fel ennyire mint ez az undormány. Mibe került volna a degenerált készítőknek pályánként egy checkpoint ? Ennyire trehányok voltak, vagy csak úgy gondolták, hogy ha már ingyenes a játék és nem csináltunk belőle pénzt akkor szopjon egy kicsit a hülyegyerek játékos is ? El sem tudom képzelni mi járhatott a fejükben. De mindegy, csak azért töltöttem le ezt a förmedvényt, hogy az achievmenteket megszerezzem, kb 5 órát töltöttem el ezzal a "mesterművel". Ha lesz játék amit soha nem fogok elfelejteni az ez lesz. 
Nagyon érdekel a véleményetek a játékkal kapcsolatban, 2 dolog lehetséges szerintem : A, ez egy csodálatos játék és én vagyok egy nagyon béna, pancser játékos aki a régi Nokia telefonos Bounce játékkal még elboldogult de az újgenerációs Drop Alive már megszégyenítette és szarrá verte. Vagy B : ez a játék egy emberiség ellen elkövetett bűncselekmény és nekem van igazam.
Ha játszottatok a játékkal akkor írjátok le nyugodtan egy kommentben a véleményeteket, mert nagyon kiváncsi vagyok rájuk, hogy én vagyok e az ügyetlen vagy a játék a rossz.
Én nagyon nem ajánlom ezt a játékot nektek, nekem már elvett 5 órát az életemből és szerintem 5 ősz hajszálat adott viszonzásképpen cserébe. Higgyétek el azért, hogy felidegesítsen nem éri meg játszani vele, ezt a ti érdeketekben mondom.
Köszönöm, hogy elolvastátok az értékelésemet eme "csodaszép" játékról, a saját érdeketekben ne játszátok.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014163253', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1499628904}
review:
[u][b]-Quick Review-[/b][/u]
Drop Alive is a short 2d indie Platformer developed by Ipsilon Developments, and released Dec 6, 2016.
Drop Alive is a simple (AND FREE) quick 2d platformer you can play through the whole game in an hour or so, the final few levels are quite difficult and probably what put off most people from their experience.

[u][b]-Detailed breakdown review-[/b][/u]
[b]Story:[/b] You play as a water droplet going on an adventure. It's a 2d platformer, what do you want? Mario is an Italian Plumber jumping on mushroom people and fighting a giant turtle, 2d platformers can be about literally anything.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=955508501

[b]Gameplay:[/b] As you progress through the game the water droplet gets turned into water vapor, and also gets frozen into an ice ball.

Keep in mind that while you move as a water droplet you slowly lose water... until you eventually disappear and then need to restart the level.

You can re-hydrate at several locations, as well as gathering extra golden tokens.
[i](for the achievers: You can get a token, and die, and finish without it, as long as you touched the token and finished the level you get credit for getting all tokens.)[/i]

[b]Conclusion:[/b] I wanted to play a short little game, and hoped to get some easy achievements... and that's pretty much what I got. Like I said, the final few levels were rough, but everything else was an enjoyable cute experience.

Once again, the game is free and only an hour long. If you want a diversion, do download and play it really quick.

[b]My Thoughts Video:[/b]
https://youtu.be/-8EYdgYZ2ss

author: {'steamid': '76561198253044879', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1499625771}
review: Completed the whole game and, as many others wrote before me, struggled a lot with sloppy controls. Therefore, regardless of the joy this actually fun and cute game brings along, it was a pain to finish untill the end. Especially the electric level. I realised the last achievement wouldn't unlock, despite all the tokens having been collected. After I've read that the developer claimed you have to reset your stats ingame so the counter would work again, I did, and not only did the counter still not work, it also reset all achievements of this game in my steam account to zero, erasing everything I worked for. Frustrating experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176225063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1499590153}
review:
Графика очень мила, но сам игровой процесс очень быстро начинает вызывать раздражение - вот прямо очень быстро, практически с самого начала. Сначала ты думаешь, что нет ничего хуже ползанья и перепрыгивания по стенам. Потом ты попадаешь в печку и понимаешь, что стены и огонь - это просто ппц какое сочетание. Потом ты падаешь в холодильник и превращаешься из малконтролируемой капли в абсолютно неконтролируемый кусок льда, который то двигаться невозможно заставить, то остановиться. А ведь есть еще СВЧ...
Пожалуй, но степени раздражения можно сравнить с алаваровской мини-игрулей "Охота на большую рыбу" - там была та же схема слипания со стеной, которая просто убивала время и нервы. Здесь еще добавлен постоянный процесс испарения капли - вас гонят в шею как только можно, навстречу горелкам и электропроводам. Быстрой смерти, товарищи, и снова здравствуй, начало уровня!

author: {'steamid': '76561198165806851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1499106394}
review: "Drop Alive" is a free, short platform game. As a player, you must control a water droplet in its way through the hostile world. The droplet can be in three different forms, depending on an environment - liquid, ice or water vapour. Each of the form have different properties eg. liquid water can stick to the walls due to adhesive forces, vapor goes constantly upwards. Game has a cartoon-like graphics. It is relatively easy, but there are places where you may be frustrated. If you want to find all tokens, not just finish the game, it can be a bit harder. There is some bug in achievement counter. Overall, the game is ok.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973041453', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1500932284}
review:
A beautifully drawn free to play game. A gentle platformer, with some tricky elements to navigate. Although at times it is a little awkward to control, afterall you are a cute bouncing drop of water gradually getting smaller and smaller, it does not detract from the game play too much.

Well worth recommending for the beauty of the animation and also the gameplay which is quite easy to complete for all those who want to collect all the achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015003424', 'num_games_owned': 1489, 'num_reviews': 266, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1499180581}
review: Drop Alive is a cute platformer with good-looking stylized graphics and pleasant music, and some nice easy levels. As well as some very frustrating levels. Especially bits where the drop turns into a nigh uncontrollable ice ball that moves too fast and requires constant anticipatory leaps of faith because the screen is way too zoomed in for the breakneck speeds and there is no way to tell what's ahead. Constantly reloading from the start of the level when the exit was already in sight, and having to collect all of the tokens every time, will make anyone's blood boil and I recommend taking frequent breaks with something less stressful to re-center your chi. Menus only add to the frustration, having to cycle through everything just to get to the right item. Especially the level selection screen that can totally give someone motion sickness looking at the flashing screens, trying to find the one level with a missing token. At the end of the day, though, the game is free, well executed for the most part, and can be beaten in a couple of hours so I see no reason not to recommend you try it for yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078978294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1499047509}
review:
Of all the different genres of video games I’ve experienced, 2-D platformers have always been my favorite. There are few things I enjoy more than sitting down with a snack and a glass of water to enjoy a well-made 2-D platformer. As such, you can probably imagine my excitement upon finding a free platformer on Steam with a relatively high user score. Eager for what was likely to come, I rapidly downloaded the game and began playing, filled with hope for the upcoming adventure and joy for returning to the realm of platformers.

	By the time I finished Drop Alive just under an hour and a half later, all of that hope and happiness had degenerated into disappointment and frustration.

	To the game’s credit, its graphics and music are both top notch. In fact, it was the former aspect that initially caught my attention before I realized that the game was a 2-D platformer. It has a beautiful art style which appears to be hand-drawn and any animations seem fluid and natural. Likewise, the music perfectly complements the moods of the stages established through their graphics. In short, Drop Alive both looks and sounds (for the most part, more on this later.) amazing, an aspect which immediately hooks in prospective gamers.

	Unfortunately, these gamers will realize perhaps the most fundamental weakness of Drop Alive as soon as they pick up their controllers: the control. While the main character’s vertical motion is alright, its horizontal movement is perhaps the slowest of all characters in 2-D platformers I’ve played. This leads any kind of movement in the game to feel sluggish and, by extension, thoroughly unnatural to gamers who have developed any kind of intuition with 2-D platformers. I played Drop Alive for 80 minutes total and, by the end, I was still missing jumps and dying because I just couldn’t get used to the control, despite my deep experience in the 2-D platformer genre.

	[spoiler]The poor control of the main character extends to its alternate forms as well. As the player character is a water droplet, its adventure vaporizes it into a cloud of steam at certain points and chills it down to a ball of snow/ice at others. While the first transformation controls fine, the latter literally feels like it was never play-tested whatsoever. While in snowball form, the main character moves far too quickly, which makes any kind of platforming that is even remotely precise a virtual impossibility. Unfortunately, later stages combine this alternate form with jumps over lethal fluid or other hazards, leading to many premature deaths throughout the game. This issue is exacerbated by the inability to control the snowball’s aerial drift after a jump, entailing even more deaths at the hands of this game’s lackluster control.[/spoiler]

	It is upon reaching these later stages where much death occurs at the hands of this game’s control that the second major issue of Drop Alive rears its ugly head: the complete lack of a health bar or checkpoints. Yes, that’s right: whenever you make a mistake in Drop Alive, you die immediately and have to start the stage all over again. In other words, in order to complete a level in Drop Alive, you need to play the stage essentially perfectly. While this game design is archaic at best and absolutely inexcusable at worst, the game’s issues related to control make this all the worse, since the game causes you to make mistakes through its faulty control and subsequently ruthlessly punishes you for making these mistakes.

	Finally, as mentioned in the section on Drop Alive’s positive attributes, while the music of the game is certainly one of the game’s strongest elements, some of the in-game sounds definitely qualify as flaws. Most notably, upon dying, the water droplet lets out a whine, as if it is on the verge of tears. As previously stated, death in this game is far more irritating than it needed to be, but this addition just made everything slightly worse. This may seem to be a minor point on the surface level, but trust me: when you’re dying repeatedly due to the aforementioned problems and being forced to start at the beginning of the stage each time, the main character sobbing and moaning gets on your nerves fairly quickly.

	I honestly wish I could recommend Drop Alive. As previously stated, this game boasts a near perfect blend of music and aesthetics, which confers it a magnetic pull for potential gamers; however, I simply cannot recommend a game with such a vile combination of awful controls and literally no leeway for error. Even with its nonexistent price tag, Drop Alive still falls short of what else can be found on Steam. If you’re looking for a free 2-D platformer on Steam, I’d suggest The Expendabros over this any day: while its presentation may be strictly inferior to that of Drop Alive, it stands head and shoulders over Drop Alive in the gameplay department. Drop Alive may have not wasted any of my money, but it certainly infuriated me and wasted my time. And, to be honest, I think that’s probably worse.

review:
A short but interesting puzzle game, it is a simple standard platformer, the art style and music make it feel relaxing even though some levels frustrating, especially when trying to collect tokens, which is a important task to get skins for your droplet. 

Completed the game in about 4 hours, but returned for few more bc its a good choice when you have little time to play and more elabored games are hard to keep up playing little time each day, so if you have that much time to spare, do give it a shot since its completely free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031560426', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1498658862}
review:
[h1] Drop Alive - Der Weg eines Wassertropfens[/h1]

Ein Wassertropfen ist ganz alleine in einem fremden Krug in einem fremden Haus. Er möchte aber lieber zu seinen Wassertropfen-Freunden im Garten. Also macht er sich auf den Weg durch die Küche um irgendwie nach draußen zu gelangen.

Als Wassertropfen kann er alle drei bekannten Aggregatzustände annehmen. Im gasförmigen Zustand schwebt er durch die Welt, im flüssigen Zustand kann er rollen und hüpfen und im festen Zustand schneller rollen und weiter hüpfen.
Diese verschieden Zustände sind schön in den Platformer integriert, machen die Level aber teilweise auch sehr mühsam. Gerade als Gaswolke verliert der Tropfen schnell seine Masse und muss sich, wie aber auch im flüssigen Zustand, regelmäßig mit neuem Wasser beladen.

Positiv herausheben muss ich die nicht linearen Hindernisse in den späten Levels. Bin ich es sonst gewöhnt schnell ein Muster zu erkennen, war ich hier nicht dazu fähig. Im Spiel selbst war das ein riesen Frustfaktor, im Nachhinein finde ich das jedoch gut. Denn nicht jedes Spiel muss einfach sein.
Aber leider wird das Spiel durch teilweise sehr merkwürdige Hitboxen unnötig schwer gemacht. Aber da kann ich drüber hinweg sehen.

Das Spiel wirkt auf mich handgezeichnet, den Soundtrack finde ich OK. Gerade in längeren Levels nervte er mich hin und wieder.

Drop Alive kann ich nur empfehlen. Es ist kostenlos und hat mich für knappe drei Stunden unterhalten. Wenn auch mit einigen Frustmomenten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159150466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1497985398}

author: {'steamid': '76561198120177142', 'num_games_owned': 1249, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1498212357}
review:
Hoi~ 我是小茄
http://wowtomato.blogspot.tw/2017/06/drop-alive-purring-quest-bridge-braid.html
一款以死探路的免費小品遊戲
我很喜歡它是水滴的特性設計
操作很簡單，只要移動跟跳躍
關卡設計普通，搭配一點化學想法覺得有趣
8/9的成就=全部的關卡
喜歡拿成就的朋友若能接受死亡就回該關卡起點的話可以玩
想要全成就則還要搜集路上的tokens，有些位置有點刁
推薦給喜歡2D小品、簡單關卡、有耐心嘗試路線的人遊玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198372064534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1504798902}
review: Drop alive is a sweet game but also a little bit difficult. You play a drop, yes, a drop. And as a drop you have to think about which properties you have, f.e. you don't like sponges but you like other drops, which make you bigger. Thinking about this, you have to deal with different problems in levels in a jump and run style. Meanwhile you have to think fast, or you die. You may not make any mistake, or you die. This game doesn't forgive. Usually, I really hate such games. I can't tell why it isn't like this in case of drop alive but I did a level sometimes 50 times. It is great and I just couldn't stop playing it.

review: I've tried to play this game a few times, but the game is very unforgiving. Each mistake kills you, causing you to start the entire level over again. No hearts, no life, just death. author: {'steamid': '76561198067133364', 'num_games_owned': 1272, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1496500899}
review: A short but cute game. It really is your standard platformer but on the casual side. The art style and relaxing music make it feel soothing even though some levels can still be unnerving, especially when trying to collect tokens - which is of course a must to get skins for your droplet [the sunglasses droplet is awesome]. Completed game and all achievements in about two hours - so if you have that much time to spare, do give it a shot - especially for the price tag - completely free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198319303341', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1590705054}
review:
Quite an interesting concept, I will say. Plays just like you would expect a classic platformer would (Controls could be a bit tighter in liquid form). While it's nothing truly groundbreaking, Drop Alive is still much better than most other indie platformers on Steam. I've cleared every level up until the level "Drop Alive" (Which I beleive is the final stage?) It's more challenging than what I expected, and might be a turnoff to more novice players, as the difficulty really begins to ramp up almost a little bit too quickly starting at the electrical-themes levels.
Music was a bit repetitive at times, but it wasn't ever a bad thing. I enjoyed the leitmotif being used in a variety of styles to accentuate the current environment, and the choice of a woodwind ensemble was very soothing. A game I'd definitely reccomend to those who just want to take an hour or so and relax.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221153404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1509485634}

review:
Joguinho curto porém muito divertido e desafiante. Você é uma gota d'gua e tem que lutar para não secar e desaparecer. Se colocando em baixo de ''cascatas de água corrente'' para crescer de tempo em tempo. Uma mecânica diferenciada que faz do jogo uma opção bem interessante para fãs de jogos de plataforma. Possui conquistas e é grátis. Vale muito a pena!

Gameplay que fiz: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xMSW0THP1I&t=254s Confira.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297041674', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1600368562}
review:
Deceptively simple, especially in the first few levels. Drop Alive is a short, sweet little game with a whimsical soundtrack and an adorable drop of water as the main and only character. Collecting all the tokens can be surprisingly frustrating and there are [i]no[/i] checkpoints in levels, so be prepared. 

Great way to pass the time. And it's free! What are you waiting for?

review:
Un jeu rafraîchissant qui fait bien suer!   Le gameplay se diversifie, la difficulté aussi, les décors dégagent tous une ambiance particulières et la musique.. ah, la ca se répète un peu, on peut pas tout demander.
environ 3 heures pour être achevé, il reste quelque bug dont mes amis ont eu affaire (par ce qu'OH que oui je conseille ce jeu), notamment de ne pas pouvoir acquerir les  trois deniers points, rien de méchant.

C'est un petit jeu mais il est loin d'être si simple et la rejouabilité est là pour un second tour de manège.
La goutte est bonne, goutez-s'y!

author: {'steamid': '76561198008293937', 'num_games_owned': 10754, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1493750053}
review: Ein nettes Spiel für Zwischendurch das man auch in kurzer Zeit bis zum Ende spielen kann. Die Levels sind kurz, aber trotzdem ein klein wenig fordernd. Durch die kurzen Level selbst und die maximal 3 auffindbaren Bonusdrops je Level ist die Gefahr allzu großer Frustrationen auch schon dahin. Mit dem Steam-Controller ist das Spiel auch gut steuerbar und mit ein wenig Aufwand ist auch das Erspielen der Achievements auch nicht wirklich aufwändig. Dass das Spiel kostenlos ist überraschte mich, da ich auch für wesentlich weniger Inhalt Geld ausgegeben habe. Wer mal von einem anderen Spiel ein wenig Ablenkung braucht ist hier auf jeden Fall gut beraten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025204938', 'num_games_owned': 2984, 'num_reviews': 489, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1492979036}
review:
I am not a fan of platforming games, but I'm gonna have to give this (Free!) game a huge thumbs up.  As many others have stated, the platforming feats required to make it through the levels are very fair.  You'll die a LOT, but you will always understand why you died and will probably be ready for another attempt.  The graphic style is adorable and the game runs really well.  I could really see this being turned into a series of games.  Maybe a Drop RPG, or Drop Racing.  

I would love to see an "easy" mode that features checkpoints.  Some of the levels are longer than others and restarting an entire level can be a putoff.  Also, and this may just be my imagination and saltiness, but I think the "hit" radius on spikes (noticed it on Like a Drip in a Storm) may either a bit large or a bit skewed past the top of the spikes themselves.

Anyways, I loved it and cannot wait to see more from this team!

author: {'steamid': '76561198288258686', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 926, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1677272012}
review: This is one of the more interesting platformers I've played, free to play or not. It doesn't take massive amounts of time to complete from start to finish if you know all the levels and can readily beat them, which is a huge plus for me. When I start seeing games that take 100+ hours to complete I immediately start thinking of most of that "game" being a movie with very little actual gaming involved. This one is pure gameplay, and it delivers exactly what I expected from it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355023648', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1557913708}

author: {'steamid': '76561198115071870', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1492552482}
review: This game is really nice in terms of art style. I was soo happy getting into it. I REALLY wanted to like this game. Some levels are cute and funny and have enough challenge to keep it interesting. BUT some levels you will die over and over again and you will want to tear out your hair. Without a checkpoint system one mistake and you are back at the beginning of the level. It is by far the most inferiating game i have played in a long time. I am going to uninstall this game from my computer because i don't even want to look at it on my desktop. 2/10 rating and the 2 comes from the few doable levels and cute art style.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120632907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1492390434}
review:
[h1] Drop Alive	[/h1]
[b] Pros: [/b]
+ Free
+ Achievements
+ Art Style 
+ Good Layout Of Levels

[b] Cons: [/b]
- Short
- Challenging to get all achievements for some people

[b] Review [/b]
Drop Alive is a cute little game that shows you the life of a drop of water. It's free and if you are into platformer games then this should be a great game for you. If you are an Achievement Hunter this is also a good free game to play, but it will probably take a little more skill then you first thought it would be. I enjoyed the art style and it ran very smoothly. It's a little tricky to get the hang of some of the levels, but all in all it was quite enjoyable. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes platformer games and free things.

[b] This was Curated for PC Beta Gaming if you would like to follow us the link is below: [/b]
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/PC-BetaG#curation

This review is just my opinion. If you liked this review please give it a thumbs up. Thank you for reading my review. If you would like to see more of my reviews the link is below: 
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198120632907/recommended/?p=1

author: {'steamid': '76561198091980511', 'num_games_owned': 162, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1491675323}
review:
This is a hard one to really review. While I'm marking it as I won't recommend this game, I might as well start off on the good points.

The first thing that's amazing is the art. I'm a sucker for drawn art and animations and found it stunning. Reminds me of some of the old cartoons I saw as a kid.
The story is really soothing and cute as it seems like the life of a water drop trying to get back out where it belongs.
The levels from beginning to end seems to work really well in telling the story and shows the hazards that a water drop might face.

But now for the negatives...
1) While the art is wonderful, there seems to be a center point that's off at times. It's more noticable at least in steam form as when you turn left and then right, the character jolts from one direction to the next.
This became a huge problem in some of the hotter levels as when I tried to maneuver myself out of a hole... I got hit by the flames when I didn't want to move that far to either the left or right.

1b) Not only on the water drop, but the hazards markers seem very wonky. I've had times where the fire killed me when I was no where close to the fire. I have no clue why or how it happened.
Then the spike traps where at times I can jump over them easily and other times it seems that that same jump would pop the water drop.

2) The difficulty is really unfair and seems artificial. What I mean by this can be seen in the sewer level. Sometimes the sewage drops will have a certain pattern... but if you reload that save or you died and tried it again, going back to that area where there's sewage, the dropping is completely random. I've had a time where it dropped in threes and I couldn't get past it because there was no safe spot... making me have to force a death to or quit out to try again.
I would also add as I've seen other reviewers say where the no checkpoint set up really hurts it here too. Many of the deaths felt cheap as at times you have to guess what can kill you and what can't. One minute something spikey can hurt you, but other backgrounds which looks like spikes or thorns can be walked on. There's a few leaps of faith as well where you have no clue where you're going and usually ends up in a quick death and leads to a lot of trial and error of memorizing where everything is to be able to get through the level.

3) The controls at times seems a bit wonky at certain points where the water drop seems to either want to move on it's own (and no I don't mean in slush form as it makes sense with it that it would be slippery... except for times when I'm in the air and it wants to "slide" around in the air for some reason), and had one time where the water drop fell through the floor and I had to close the game and re-opened it to try again.

4) While I say the story is wonderful... the ending wasn't. It ended way too abrupt with no real explaination or understanding of the ending. What I thought the water drop would've done, as it seems to make sense as it's water, it went the other direction and... the game just goes to black and says "Thanks for playing."

Now if this was just an animation (despite the abrupt ending), I would recommend this without question as I like things like this, but as a game, I can not with the flaws it has.
One can say though, "It's bloody free so you shouldn't complain.", in which sense... I'm really not. For a free game it's not bad, but just because it's free shouldn't excuse some of the problems there are.

I hope maybe the creator(s) can see this review and just take it as some pointers than see it as a bashing as I think this game could really turn out to be a really wonderful game if a few things were tweaked.

Maybe in future projects, these problems are squashed and they make a paid released game? I'm looking forward to it.
Good luck out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198245426660', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1491650643}

author: {'steamid': '76561198116137351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1486283646}
review:
This game is a little bit of a puzzle game mixed with the platform game it obviously is. In this game you are a water drop, that has to get forward. You get smaller all the time, so you must find a spot where you can grow again. In some levels you turn into steam so you can fly, and then back to water etc. As much as I like the idea of this game, I really just didn't enjoy playing it. The physics and overall gameplay feel way too sloppy for me. It also reminds me of a game I played online for free back in like 2009, which really doesn't exactly compliment this game as the online game from almost 10 years ago was made better.
I'm going to give it a 6/10. Would be 4 for the game but the extra 2 are for the creativity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299415305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1491825357}
review:
非常精美清新的小游戏，小水滴非常萌，加上3种形态在游戏中的转化应用，非常有意思。
游戏总共9关，感觉关卡少了点，不过有的关卡有时候还是很容易死掉。对了，游戏中每一关卡收集的黄色水滴【最难得成就大概就是集齐每一个关卡的蓝色水滴了！！！！】可以用来买小水滴三种形态的皮肤，我超级喜欢猫咪形态的液体水滴皮肤，萌死了o(*≥▽≤)ツ【PS：气体状态的我买了那个彩虹的那个皮肤很可爱，固体形态就是冰块状态我买的头戴盔甲的那个23333】
作为一款免费游戏，除了关卡少了点，整体都很不错的，总共9成就，而且游戏过程还是很有意思的【我是用手柄玩的，因为我手残_(:з」∠)_】
总之就是，推荐！推荐！！推荐！！！强烈推荐！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198078202213', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1491247785}
review:
Alla ricerca di un platform migliore.

Gameplay: Mi ha davvero deluso. Per i miei gusti l'ho trovato scomodo. In alcune ore di gioco non sono mai riuscito a farmelo piacere.

Grafica e Sonoro: Ottimi. La grafica sicuramente spicca in assoluto ma è l'unica cosa buona.

Complessivamente: Sono stato attirato dalla grafica "cartunesca" e simpatica ma appena ho iniziato a giocare i comandi non mi hanno dato un buon feeling. Gli ho dato un paio di opportunità ma non mi ha soddisfatto. Non saprei spiegarvi ma i comandi sono davvero scomodi, poco reattivi e questo mi ha rovinato tutta l'esperienza di gioco.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130517345', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1490925507}
review:
.
Pontos Positivos
Drop Alive cumpre como jogo de plataforma coletando algumas moedas durante as fases.
A arte apesar de simples é bonita. 
Pontos negativos.
  Dificuldade aplicada de forma errada a falta de um checkpoint durante as fases só torna as mecânicas do jogo mais repetitivas, pois somente pulamos flutuamos e deslizamos até um determinado local que tenha agua para não desaparecermos (o protagonista é uma gota d’ agua) escapando de poucas variações de obstáculos.
Poucas variações de trilha sonora que conseguem ser ruins até na hora de morrermos o que acaba só reforçando a repetição do jogo.
As conquistas são um dos poucos incentivos para joga-lo novamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029972608', 'num_games_owned': 654, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1489889051}
review:
[b]PROS:[/b]
+ FREE
+ charming art style
+ nice soundtrack

[b]CONS:[/b]
- really short game time
- mouse pointer does not disappear
- a couple of bugs/glitches

[b]Comment:[/b]
This game looks cute and as a casual platformer it's fun. Both the art style and the soundtrack help you relax while playing. Level design is good although not perfect. Like collecting the tokens seems a bit counter-intuitive, some require you to kill yourself in order to get them. Luckily you only need to pick up each token once. The game might still need a bit of polish. After finishing and collecting all tokens (I got the achievement) it shows me I am missing all 3 tokens on the last level and 1 from the level before the last. Also the hitboxes are inconsistent in some parts, especially against spikes and flames. Overall a nice little indie game that, while flawed, will give you some platforming fun for a little while.
------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]If you liked this review you can find more on the [/b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28638055-Subjective-Reviews-Corner/][u]Curator page[/u][/url][b] or in my [/b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/srcorner][u]Review Corner[/u][/url][b].[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198250109480', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1484814965}
review:
超级可爱的一款免费的小游戏~在这个游戏里，你扮演一滴小水珠（游戏名就叫一滴水珠的生活），在某个早晨，从一个罐子里醒来，眺望到了远处的大海，你想到那里去，于是你就这么从屋子里展开了艰难的前往大海的旅途。
游戏挑战性很棒，作为一滴水珠，你的目的就是在你自己的水分（生命）彻底干掉（消耗）前尽可能的走到远处，有时候需要与环境互动，改变你自己的形态，并且通过环境补充水份(比如通过漏水的水管)，走到更远，算是款动作解密（？）游戏吧……反正我这个手残只玩到了第五关，作为推荐，大家来玩一下把。
萌点：
1、画风超级萌！！萌了超级加印象分的好不？！！
2、音效音乐超级可爱有趣，不试试嘛？~
3、支持键盘和手柄，操作上来说大家都有福了嘿嘿。
手残点：
1、我认为是动作解密的原因嘛……它真的是动作解密啊（揪桌），不仅考验你要怎么通过环境互动走到终点，好多地方不是不知道怎么玩，而是手残真的过不去啊（揪桌）！总是差一点点好不！！
2、研究怎么过去真的很重要。
3、有时候，人品这种东西，可遇不可求的QVQ
总之游戏我超级喜欢！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198066879913', 'num_games_owned': 1559, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1488662657}
review:
[h1]Wasser ist nicht nur zum Waschen da![/h1]

Genau denn man kann prima mit Wasser auch ein kleines Game auf Steam durchzocken. Gemeint ist natürlich das liebevoll gestaltende [b]Drop Alive![/b]

Ein kleiner Wassertropfen fühlt sich in der leeren Tasse so einsam, dass er sich prombt auf den Weg in die weite Welt macht. Dazu nutzt er die besonderen Eigenschaften des Wasserelements. Als flüssiger Wassertropfen sind Klettereinlagen kein Problem. Als Dampfwolke schweben wir an die weitesten Orte und als Eis rammen wir uns den Weg frei. Gekonnt sind diese Elemente in Szene gesetzt.

Ziel des Spieles ist es einfach salopp gesagt das [b]Ziel[/b] zu erreichen. Zusätzlich kann man für weitere Outfits pro Level 3 Münzen sammeln die diese dann freischalten.

Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist am Anfang mehr als einfach wobei dieser mit zunehmenden Level immer schwerer wird. Das liegt auch eher daran das die immer größer werdenden Level keine Checkpoints haben und unser "Wasser" viele Gefahren trotzen muss (Eventuell möglicher Frustfaktor).

Achievments gibt es in der kostenlosen Version ebenfalls (Bis zu 9 Stück die man sich dann auch redlich verdient hat).
Sammelkarten hingegen findet man nur in der kostenpflichtigen Version.

Im Großen und Ganzen ist es ein wirklich liebevolles Spiel mit durchdachten Gameplay das obwohl es recht kurz ist mit vielen Details punkten kann.

[b]Chocowertung: 8 von 10 Punkten[/b] (-2 aufgrund der fehlenden Checkpoints und der am Ende auftauchenden frustierenden Stellen)

author: {'steamid': '76561198036493623', 'num_games_owned': 1084, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1487875858}
review:
[h1]Drop Alive[/h1]
[b]Twórca :[/b]
[h1]Invi Games[/h1]
[b]Silnik :[/b]
[h1]Unity Engine[/h1]

[h1]★★★★★★✰✰✰✰ 6/10 ★★★★★★★★★★[/h1]

[list]
[*]✌ Fajny Art-Style i przyjemny soundtrack.
[*]✌ Całkiem fajnie zaprojektowane lokacje.
[*]✌ Przyjemny gameplay.
[*]✌ Wysoka jakość wykonania jak na grę za darmo.

[*]⚡ Trwa jakieś 2h maksując wszystko.
[*]⚡ Źle zaprojektowane menu.
[*]⚡ Nie wyróżnia się czymś szczególnym.
[/list]

Drop Alive to całkiem przyjemna, darmowa minigierka, która niestety dupy nie urywa, ale od nudy można zagrać, bo gra jest solidnie wykonana, ma przyjemną muzykę no i posiada parę fajnych mechanik. Jedyne co już na start zaczęło mnie wkurzać to menu główne, które cały czas przeskakuje z klawiszy klawiatury na symbole pada.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985897676', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1487263768}
review:
I usually like platformer games alot but this one not that much in the end. The character is cute and the environment is well designed. Tho some parts of the game I wasn't quite sure where my little drop was dropping. I would give some sort of level info in the beginning of each level. Also the lack of check points made the harder levels really, really frustrating. I think I spent around 25 mins on the last two levels of the total 1h playtime which was enough to end the game. The ending cut scene was also a little disappointing. 

Pros:
- Basic platformer
- Nice graphics
- Cute character

Cons:
- Lack of checkpoints

I would give this a solid 3/7

author: {'steamid': '76561198132785104', 'num_games_owned': 7194, 'num_reviews': 792, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1486847011}
review:
Перед нами достаточно противоречивый платформер, в котором главный герой - капля воды, пытается сбежать с кухни в более приятную для себя среду обитания, а помогать ей в этом деле будем мы.
Несмотря на всю милоту и няшность, малое количество уровней и их протяжённость, за приятной глазу картинке скрывается хладнокровный убийца нервов, Его Величество Хардкор, который не прощает ни единой ошибки !
Вас убивает буквально всё, в каком бы состоянии вы не находились: пар, вода, лёд (лишь последний более-менее устойчив к некоторым трудностям).
Просто пройти/пробежать игру - половина дела, собрать все разбросанные по уровням токены (и, соответственно, достижения) - совсем другая история. Лично мне на комплит понадобился час.
За счёт того, что игра распространяется бесплатно, ознакомится с ней может каждый, но в первую очередь я всё же рекомендую её опытным любителям платформеров, а остальным - на свой страх и риск.
Ставлю Drop Alive плюс, так как она не успела мне надоесть/выбесить, распространяется бесплатно, имеет баланс продолжительность-сложность (изменяется при попытке собрать всё) и обладает приятной рисовкой и ОСТами.

author: {'steamid': '76561198213329891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1486843192}
review:
Pros
- Cute
- Interesting concept of gameplay
- Nice graphics and design
- Realistic fire 
- Token tracker
- 12 challenging levels
- Free

Cons
- Lack of level overview
- Some levels are difficult
- Lack of checkpoints 
- Lack of tutorial

This game could be further improved by:-
1) Adding checkpoints (perhaps after reaching the recharging point, 
2) Resizing the level select (because you need to click the arrow keys multiple times in order to repeat the desired level). Certainly, the devs can fit all 12 levels in one screen,
3) Adding a short tutorial on what to get (the tokens as it is important for an achievement), how the droplet functions and what to avoid. 

Overall, this could be one of my free favourite games if its not for the difficultness for I need to repeat certain levels more than 10 times and 4 hours to complete it. Perhaps, I am not good in platformer games. 

However, you should give it a try and challenge yourself. It can be frustrating but satisfying.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999721387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1486405042}
review:
-Gameplay-

It's kind of like Super Meat Boy except shorter, easier, and without the frantic moments or the badass feel.  In other words, you'll be cursing in frustration while you struggle through a tedious section, only to sigh with relief upon clearing it instead of feeling like you did something awesome.  Difficulty goes up and down from one level to the next.

-Style-

High res graphics are nice, hand drawn art style is pleasant, music is unobtrusively generic.  The player character is cutesy, sometimes annoyingly so.  Aside from the squeaky voice work, it's aesthetically enjoyable.

-Overall-

If you're looking for a free side scroller on the PC, I'd recommend Cave Story or Khimera over this one any day.  They don't look or sound as sharp as Drop Alive, but they're much more fun, creatively nuanced, story driven, immersive, memorable, etc.  The fact that either one of them is free amazes me.  Drop, on the other hand, feels exactly like freeware/shovelware.  Not a turd, but not a gem by any means.

author: {'steamid': '76561198306473582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1486395787}
review:
很有趣的动作游戏。
控制一粒水滴，每一关在蒸发干之前收集3颗黄色珠子然后通过终点即可。
利用场景中的不同要素，可以在气态液态固态三相中切换，每个形态的物理特性完全不同。
画面清新，操作简单（只有←↓→方向和跳跃）。关卡中没有随机运气要素，就算动作游戏苦手多试几次也一定能过关。

全收集的游戏时间大约2小时。

作为免费游戏算是非常良心了。
付费的DLC中包含游戏音乐、设定集、桌面背景和额外的皮肤，但并没有新关卡，可以算是募捐性质的DLC了，真正有爱的朋友可以买来去支持一下制作组。

review:

最后一关对于我这个手残来说太难了，玩了好多遍还是过不去- -

author: {'steamid': '76561197992856756', 'num_games_owned': 3381, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1486326921}
review:
Un bon petit plateformeur qui reprend le concept de la goutte d'eau qui rétréci au fur & à mesure qu'on avance, même concept que l'excellent "I-Fluid" de 2008 mais en version 2D cartoon déssiné à la main en simpliste mais charmant & efficace.
Le tout dans 12 petit niveaux assez court (heureusement, vu qu'on peut mourir d'une simple petite erreur & reprendre le niveau du début), mais assez sympathique.
Qui va trouver la petite réfèrence au "Chevalier du Zodiaque"!?

author: {'steamid': '76561198280000875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1487434498}
review:
Drop alive. Классная игра. Ты играешь за каплю, которая бежит на волю. 
Плюсы: 
Приятный геймплей
Уровни средней сложности
Хорошая прорисовка
Минусы: 
Таковых нет
10/10

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198244898146', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1485553634}

author: {'steamid': '76561198131790745', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1515685301}
review: Такс короче сейчас вы прочитаете самый объективный обзор этой игры.Эта игра в стиле бегать прыгать за ебучую капельку пота под спидами которая должна перепрыгивать пики точеные  уворачиваться от электричества.Иногда вас могут превратить в пердеж или ебучий сгусток твердого льда который ебошит со скоростью суперкаров а тормоза от жигуля готорые нахуй сломаны.Ваша цель съебаться из дома ебучих сладкоежек которые повсюду вам оставили капканы чтобы вы не смогли спиздить их ебучие леприконские монеты. ПРиятной игры в этот шедевр.

author: {'steamid': '76561198356812199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1498985309}

author: {'steamid': '76561198108265772', 'num_games_owned': 1848, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1507035383}
review:
If I had to describe Drop Alive in 3 words, I would say: short, cute, and fun. This game is an interesting puzzle platformer revolving around a small water droplet's dreams of freedom. During your quest, your drop will take advantage of the 3 states of matter (gas, solid, and liquid) to get through different areas. For example, the cloud form lets your drop fly.

I was really impressed by the quality of this title for a free game. The graphics are in a cute, hand-drawn style, almost as if they come straight from the pages of a picture book. The music is well composed, and gives off the feeling of adventure. There are even cute skins you can purchase for your drop using tokens!

Overall, I would recommend this game. It has an unmistakable charm, and if it were longer, it could easily pass as a paid title.

review:
It's a fun (if not frustrating) platformer, with nice artwork and well designed levels. It only took around 90 minutes to complete so can be finished in one sitting, but it's definitely worth a try.

Although as a warning, if you are the type of person to get very angry when playing things, maybe give it a miss. One or two of the levels require a lot of restarts, and it tends to happen towards the end of the level too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197784155', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1486580095}
review:
GIOCO DAVVERO ESORBITANTE! A DIR POCO MOZZAFIATO!! Nonostante a primo impatto la visione della goccia mi sia sembrata completamente insensata, pochi istanti dopo ho raggiunto la perfezione e la pace dei sensi interpretando a pieno il significato di quella banale gocciolina. :: La goccia, piccola e solitaria, rappresenta me stesso e ogni singolo individuo che rincorre, facendo riferimento all'aspetto prettamente biblico nonchè cattolico (protestante), un obiettivo prefissatosi distante numerosi ostacoli da essa (le mensole della vita). Il raggiungimento della BROCCA rappresenta invece l'unione agli altri singoli che in modo unanime rincorrono inconsapevolmente lo stesso obiettivo e fine. N.B.: trovo a dir poco eccezionale la scelta fatta dal team di sviluppo(INVI GAMES) nell'ultimo livello della saga: LA CADUTA DELLA GOCCIA CONTINUA SUL FORNELLO DELLA CUCINA CHE NON LASCIA ALCUNO SCAMPO E RENDE VANI TUTTI GLI SFORZI FATTI DALLA GOCCIA(nonchè individuo e comunità errante). Davvero un grande gegewupe al team di svil-uppo.














Il Vostro Amato Frank the Big[unk]
Baci.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083865809', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1671425213}
review:
Drop alive es un juego plataformero en el que llevas puestas las botas en una especie de gota, la cual trata de llegar viva a fuera de la casa, lo cual es es una odisea muy poco creativa pero a la vez llamativa.

El juego se caracteriza por su simpleza y su increíble ambientación al estilo anime clásico.

La Jugabilidad en ciertos puntos llega a ser molesta, pero en sí está bien para este juego.

La música es bastante repetitiva y deja mucho que desear.

El Gameplay se torna increíblemente difícil en algunas etapas, siendo que las otras se pueden completar en cuestión de segundos.

A mi parecer es un juego con mucho potencial, es gratuíto, no pierdes nada por probarlo, se me hizo bastante corto ya que solo tiene 8 niveles, pero en sí, es un juego que debes probar si te gusta la dificultad, la simpleza Y LOS DANGOS.

PD: Cabe mencionar que los desarrolladores de este juego son latinos! Un aplauso para ellos, creo que este es su primer entrega :)

8/10 Lo recomiendo :)

Je ne suis pas sûre ^^ ça reste un jeu type plate-forme, avec les bonnes manips à enchaîner à la suite pour ne pas tout recommencer 40 fois. Mais il est quand même carrément moins prise de tête que beaucoup d'autres du même style ! On joue à deux avec mon copain, on se passe la manette quand on en a marre et c'est bien sympa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127816185', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1485623680}
review:
Drop Alive is a plarformer game in which you control a water drop and clear levels in order to get from a house to a pond. The idea is quite simple. Actually, everything about this game is simple, beginning from the visuals, though the music, sound, and controls. The graphics look done by hand, which is quite unique in video games. Only one button for jumping is used alongside the analog/d-pad movement. The game is also not too long, but not too short either. It is simple, but it is this simpliness that is its biggest charm and selling point.

Each level is different, which is nice. New elements show up. The game do not bore the player. There are three types of the drop: normal water, steam when heated and ice when frozen. It surprised me at first when the drop turned into steam when it touched a heated metal pipe. I was expecting a far more simple game. It turned out to be better than I expected. There are even small touches like that a sponge sink in the water from the drop!

I really liked playing it. It felt like good old times came back, when people made games more for sharing the fun than for the money. It has ‘this thing’ in it than a lot of games today do not have.

The biggest problem with Drop Alive are bugs. They destroy the good and fun atmosphere the game brings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046840300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1485626138}
review:
Как поразительно многообразие видеоигр! В одной игре вы драконорожденный герой в мире меча и магии. В другой игре исследуете космос. А в Drop Alive вы – капелька воды и ползаете по кухне среди грязной посуды и объедков.
 
Цели у этой капельки, конечно, простые и естественные: пройти препятствия до финиша и собрать как можно больше золотых жетонов. То есть все типично для платформера. Однако капелька испаряется со временем (к счастью, прыгучие свойства не ухудшаются, маленькая капля прыгает так же высоко, как большая), и ей нужно подпитываться влагой. Также она может иногда менять форму: становиться облачком или льдинкой. Это немного напоминает игру Element4L, которая так мне не понравилась. Но в отличие от Element4L, превращения могут происходить только в определенных моментах игры, когда попадется раскаленная труба или поток ледяного воздуха.

Также здесь очень красивая мультяшная графика и прикольные звуки, которые издает капелька. Я заметила, что даже начинаю неосознанно повторять их в реале.
 
Однако если вы думаете, что это бесплатная игра из серии «5 минут мучений - все достижения в руках и идеальная игра в статистику», то это не так. Drop Alive достаточно сложный платформер. И так быстро проходится вовсе не из-за легкости, а потому что уровней всего 12, и они небольшие. Даже у известных игр типа Скайрим или Fallout: New Vegas самое сложное и трудное достижение все же получают 2 – 3% игроков. В Drop Alive же, по глобальной статистике, все золотые жетоны смогли собрать всего лишь 0,8% из тех, кто запустил эту игру.

Но что касается сложности, то я не охарактеризовала бы ее как «непроходимый ужас». Пройти вполне можно после пары-тройки [strike]десятков[/strike] неудачных попыток.  Есть определенные верные движения, которые помогают пройти. Например, для запрыгивания с одной стенки на противоположную хорошо применить скольжение. Запрыгнуть повыше,  а потом зажать клавишу движения, и капля начнет медленно сползать вниз. И в этот момент прыгать. На последнем уровне чтобы перепрыгнуть с одного листа-пружинки на другой (там еще шипы на потолке), нужно прыгать, когда летишь вверх, и еще не достиг наивысшей точки. Тогда все получится. В этом уровне вообще стоит больше проявлять внимания, потому что, наверное, главную опасность представляют шипы, которые имеют свойство прятаться и выдвигаться в самый неподходящий момент.
  
Что касается самого прохождения, хочу сказать, что в игре не надо особо мучиться. Надо просто разобраться методом проб и ошибок, как правильно проходить препятствие, и затем выполнить эту серию правильных движений. А чтобы она так сильно не раздражала, открывать эту игру изредка, проходить небольшими сериями. Когда чувствуете, что градус раздражения увеличивается, выключайте до следующей попытки. Такая тактика, пожалуй,  хороша для любых платформеров.

К минусам игры, помимо сложности, можно отнести то, что некоторые вещи неочевидны. Например, я только на предпоследнем уровне случайно обнаружила, что формой тучки можно управлять с помощью пробела, направляя ее вниз. На момент написания обзора есть еще такой баг, что прогресс последнего уровня не сохраняется. То есть вы можете пройти игру, загрузить другие уровни, попробовать режим на время, но если вы выйдете, то когда зайдете вновь, обнаружите, что уровень в лесу отмечен как не пройденный.

С учетом вышесказанного, я все-таки порекомендовала бы эту игру любителям платформеров. Или тем, кто решил потренировать терпение. Drop Alive – не легкая игра, но она дарит позитив.  Радость от удачного прохождения заставляет растаять раздражение от неудач.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355229318', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1620476729}
review: Oyunumuzun esas kahramanı su damlacığından ibaret. Oyunda karşımıza çıkan çeşitli haritalarda esas oğlanımız kızgın borularda buharlaşıyor, soğukta buz tutuyor, suya temas ettiğinde büyüyor veya susuz kaldığında giderek küçülerek yok olabiliyor. Oyun atari havasında olsa da oynarken keyifle oynayacağınız ve uzun sürmemesi ile de sıkılmayacağınız bir oyun. Amacımız su damlacığımızı çeşitli engellerden geçirerek, oyunun sonundaki nehire kavuşturmak. Böylece binlerce su damlacığı arasında huzurlu, mutlu bir hayat sürebilecektir. Ücretsiz olması oyunu çekici hale getiriyor. Diskinizde fazla yer kaplamaması avantaj, denemeye değer bir oyun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182693509', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1503569183}
review:
第一次评价：
评价一般
虐心的一款游戏，机关的判定可能有点问题，总是死在机关的边缘，而且没有存档点特别恶心。
不过是免费游戏且成就比较简单（成就：通关游戏和收集每关的三个黄球）
玩过i wanna的应该不怕，买不起游戏的或有耐心的可以尝试一下。
游戏主题很有新意，主角是一个水球。遇热蒸发遇冷凝固，可以在蒸汽状态飞行不过身体会逐渐消瘦（雾
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
第二次评价：
12关用时103分钟，TM为什么没有存档点！
每关必要通关条件：死亡*100
已经全成就解锁，这种难度下完成很有成就感。最后我们的水滴先生成功见到了外面的世界（然后狗带)

author: {'steamid': '76561198280542569', 'num_games_owned': 401, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1528983087}
review:
我总共玩了不到一个小时就通关了。
这应该是我玩过的免费游戏中的精品。
即便在过程中我发现了两处bug（"like a drop in a storm"关卡中，开始时在铁挡板下就变成水滴状态会导致不能进入屋顶，游戏无法继续。）（似乎所有横向的刺都可以踩，作为通关的技巧。）
有些场景会有不同的路线，但结局都是一样的，只是会影响收集道具。
直接通关很容易。完成收集很难。
最后再讲一讲画面。很萌很可爱，BGM也很温馨。只是我在通关后才发现有皮肤系统。
这个游戏并非是手残党的克星，但是需要有耐心。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1485113382}
review:
[h1]Описание игры:[/h1]
Бесплатный платформер рассказывающий нам историю о приключениях капельки воды, которая решила выбраться из рутинной жизни в жилой квартире и отправилась в путешествие чтобы найти настоящий водоем где можно жить как в раю. Геймплей прост - мы должны добраться до финиша, принимая различные формы воды знакомые нам по физике (газообразная, лед, жидкость) и при этом теряя часть влаги при передвижении или столкновении с препятствиями. Чтобы не погибнуть мы должны искать любые источники воды и пополнять запас жизни нашей капли.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Великолепная рисовка и анимация в которую невозможно не влюбиться.
¥ Уровней мало, но каждый из них уникален и запоминается надолго.
¥ Игра полностью бесплатна.
¥ Простые достижения - единственная трудная ачивка, это сбор всех бонусных капель на уровнях, но после обычного прохождения можно вернуться на любой уровень и дособирать уже зная уровни наизусть.
¥ Отличный саундтрек.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Нет.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Удивительно, что такую отличную игру распространяют совершенно бесплатно. Рекомендую всем и каждому.

[h1]Оценка: 10/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330055113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1484617784}
review:
Drop Alive is a pretty good 2D platformer. I enjoyed it quite a lot. You play as a cute droplet of water, jumping from platform to platform. You attempt to avoid all spikes and lava pits:

PROS -

Free to Play
Good graphics and sound
Lag free
Easy controls

CONS -

Short, but very difficult at times

-===-

Overall fantastic game! 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198184273053', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1485212159}
review:
Un juego sobre una pequeña gota que tiene que pasar las adversidades para ser libre.

La verdad subestimé mucho el juego pensando que era algo para niños pero igual me anime a probarlo... Estaba muy equivocada. Pasé la mayor parte del tiempo tirandole maldiciones a la pobre gota que no tenía culpa de nada, la verdad me sorprendió la dificultad del juego. No es algo como "muy difícil" pero sí te arrancarás muchos cabellos de la desesperación.

Lo recomiendo, buenos gráficos, buena historia, buenos niveles y música relajante para tratar de calmar tu ira :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198335512355', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1485968324}
review:
[h1]DESAFIADOR. BONITO. GRATUITO!![/h1]

Jogo visualmente bonito, onde você é uma gotinha de água e tem que concluir objetivos que seriam básicos se não fosse por um porém... Conforme você avança a gotinha diminui de tamanho até... Morrer. Sem contar que basta relar em algum obstáculo como fogo ou eletricidade e tchau! Volta para o começo da fase e todas as insígnias são perdidas. Tudo isso citado faz um jogo de aparência fofa se tornar um belo desafio, inclusive por causa de uma conquista que requer que você pegue todas as "gotinhas douradas" das fases, pois você pode concluir um nível sem pegar uma se quer, mas se quiser platinar vai ter que ralar um pouco. E o melhor de tudo, é free!!

Me faz lembrar da época em que os games te desafiavam. Não tinha essa de vida pós game over. Morreu, tchau! Volta pro começo!
