author: {'steamid': '76561198025320454', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1485110658}
review:
Cute platform with very nice "hand-drawn" style.
It's short but enough to fully enjoy it. Also, it's not as easy as you might think since like old style platformers, you have only 1 life so when you die, you have to restart the level again. Rinse and repeat until you learn the level by heart.

And the game is amazingly for free! :-D

PS: kuudos also from some anime references (like Dr.Slump and Saint Seiya!

author: {'steamid': '76561197985668557', 'num_games_owned': 1514, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1485106954}
review:
Pro:[list]
[*]Cute art style.
[*]Relatively relaxing.
[*]Pretty fun.
[*]Neat mechanic in that your character needs to refill constantly.
[/list]

Cons:[list]
[*]The hitbox on your character is constantly changing. This means that some jumps might not work how you remember them due to your hitbox being bigger, or smaller, than it was when last you did something.
[*]Going for all the tokens is annoying. Most tokens revolve around insta-death traps and failing to grab them means you need to play the whole level again, but the levels are really easy, so this makes the game a lot less fun.
[*]The art style, while really nice to look at, leaves a pretty big issue with most objects have weird angles and slopes on them. There are some areas that look like you should be able to just roll onto them, but you need to jump up and sometimes these are in very inopportune spots.
[/list]

If you're looking for a relaxing hour, or so, of platforming this is a good game to play. I highly recommend that you don't bother with going for all the tokens though as that might end up ruining the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314197878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1485101032}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018427282', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1579183548}
review:
Finalmente un gioco con un'idea originale e ben sviluppata, non voglio anticipare niente di che, ma una cosa è certa, il gioco adesso è gratuito e conviene giocarlo, c'è tanta robaccia in giro ma l'editore di questo gioco ha creato un bel platform originale e l'ha fatto con una splendida vena ironica, sempre fortemente artistica e creativa. Esilarante anche solo la voce della nostra gocciolina.

DA PRENDERE SUBITO!

author: {'steamid': '76561198275636002', 'num_games_owned': 8, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1485074877}
review:
Gra Drop Alive jest platformówką o kropelce wody. Gra ma jest dosyć ładna i ma przyjemną muzykę,która zmienia się wraz z miejscem bohatera. Gra na początku jest przyjemna,ale potem jest frustrująca przez brak checkpoint'ów. Współczuję osobom,które przechodzą poziomy pierwszy raz. Gdy zginą, są teleportowani na sam początek. Zatacza się taka pętla.
W poziomie ''Triple Trouble'' jest dziwna losowość  kropelek ''żółtej wody''. Raz spuszczają się wszystkie naraz,pokolei itp.
Przez tę wszystkie problemy,nie jestem w stanie ocenić czasu gry. Gra ma jeszcze ciekawe skórki.

Podsumowując:

Zalety
-Gra jest ładna.
-Muzyka jest przyjemna i zmienia się wraz ze przejściem bohatera w inne miejsce.
-Ciekawe skórki.

Wady
-Brak checkpointów w tak trudnej (dla mnie) grze.
-Dziwna losowość cieczy.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198354700299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1485863977}
review:
pay for win!!
关卡设计的还是比较精美的，然而存档点设计的极不合理，每次死亡都要从头读档。

author: {'steamid': '76561198278008802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1488198735}
review:
不错的游戏。很喜欢整个带有粗糙感的风格基调。

不过有些部分真心希望有存档功能。不是我希望这个游戏做得更简单，而是这个游戏的某些部分难度太不平衡了，有的关卡一次过，有的需要反复多次。在最后那关，我感到路过很多鲜花的那个部分，是作者想要给玩家休息的地点，这时候为何不来存个档？？没有存档的结果就是我在死了多次以后，每次都面无表情地再次经过那里，那个场景变得毫无意义只是为了故意浪费时间。

review: 游戏画风2D的很可爱，很喜欢！！小水滴萌萌的，不过作为手残党，每关都只有一条命，还无中间存档点来说，下雨那关就玩的很心塞，不知道如何减肥成为苗条水滴，跳出刺坑QAQ，然后就决定哪天有耐心了再玩，还有就是后期的金色水滴不吃也没什么事，都可以过关的。 作为一个免费游戏，可玩性什么的很不错，很良心！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198066623237', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1485042729}
review:
This is probably the cutest game I've ever played. Amazing level design, great backgrounds, and an adorable character. 10/10 would recommend.

Update: The devs broke my heart. They said forever ago (around a month after release I believe) that they would look into a bug preventing people from collecting the final achievement in the game. They have made no progress, and left us without a way to get the achievement. To top that off, I haven't checked my facts, but I swear they said they were adding more content or something along those lines a while ago, and there has been nothing since.

author: {'steamid': '76561198292854225', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1484710846}
review:
自分が水になって障害物を避けながらゴールを目指すゲームです
水蒸気になったり氷になったり...パンにあたると水分もっていかれるので、自分が小さくなってしまったり…意外と頭を使います

ステージ一つの中に中間セーブがないので、ミスすると最初からです
そこだけがネックですね…

今回のアップデートでステージクリア時やミスしたときに、イラストが表示されるようになりました
とにかく可愛いです、可愛いです

無料のゲームですので、触れてみてはいかがでしょうか
可愛いイラストに癒されたい方、殺伐とした世界からちょっと目をそらしたい方にお勧めです

author: {'steamid': '76561198107662504', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1639966606}
review:
游戏讲的是一个在茶壶里的小水滴梦想融入大海，历经艰难险阻最终实现梦想的故事。
画风简洁可爱，操作简单，音乐也舒服好听，流程也不长，半小时到一小时就能通关。【全硬币收集的话可能要时间加倍了
作为一款免费游戏真是相当不错！
已经推荐给多个好友。
大家可以尝试一下。

author: {'steamid': '76561198120366192', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1484703725}
review: I spent 51 minutes in this game. More than I should have. Physics aren't that great, especially as an ice cube. I couldn't even bring myself to finish the game. After too many bogus deaths, it was far to aggravating. Seriously though, have you never heard of a checkpoint?? If you do decide to download this game, don't die, especially on the later levels. No matter how far you go (I got to the end of a level 5 times and died at the end), you have to do the entire level all over again. No matter how  long it is. I dunno... Maybe I'm just salty...

author: {'steamid': '76561198298521757', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1497574516}
review:
Drop Alive es un juego de Plataformas que trata que eres una Gota de Agua que tiene vida y se despierta en una tarra que tenia agua, se levante y se propone el mismo una misión que es salir a la Cocina (o la Casa donde esta)... que digamos que ese es toda su aventura no puedo decir otra cosa (ni el final por que dejo un rico Spoiler), pero bueno aquí dejare mi análisis del juego ;).

*LO BUENO*

-Sus Gráficos: 
 Lo que me agrada que su estilo gráfico es como un dibujo (y ese estilo me fascinan) que esta bien detallado. (para mi punto de vista)

-Su Dificultad
No digo que el juego no están fácil, y no están difícil el chiste es que eres una Gota de Agua y eso por obvias razones la Gota se hace pequeño poco a poco hasta el punto que te mueras (y eso pasa en lugares calientes o lugares que te absorben Ej: Esponja) y por eso aveces puede llegar unas etapas que te puede estar un rato en el mismo lugar (es decir te puedes morir mas de 5 veces)

-Su Jugabilidad
Para mi la Jugabilidad es Original (es mi punto de vista, no se si hay otros con ese estilo de juego) y que nos propone el juego que tiene 3 habilidades que es la lógica del agua (Liquido, Gaseoso y Solido) y esos 3 tiene diferentes formas de jugar, y son:

-La Gota de Agua (Liquido): Que es la típica jugabilidad básica de un juego de Plataformas y que te puedes avanzar en la Derecha y la Izquierda y te puedes trepar en la paredes.

-La Nube (Gaseoso): Te da la habilidad de flotar (como el Globo P del Super Mario World) pero tiene una condición que si la gota esta pequeña y si te moves mucho... te mueres.

-La Bola de Hielo (Solido): Esta habilidad te da mas velocidad pero es algo difícil saltar.

(La Nube y la Bola de Hielo no tiene salto de pared)

*LO MALO*

Que es corto el juego... y bueno... es lo único malo para mi xd

Ese fue mi análisis (y lo se, es muy largo pero me~) espero que lo hayan disfrutado y o la hayan útil ;)

P.D: Me sorprende que este juego tiene Gráficos muy chulo y a la vez es Free To Play... enserio me sorprende.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143600485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1565967207}
review:
目玉が付いた水滴というかわいらしいキャラクターと
絵本のようなほのぼのとした雰囲気

シンプルな操作性と軽快なアクション

水滴だから乾いたところに触れると縮んでしまう、
零れ落ちる水に触れると大きくなる、
熱されたパイプに触れると湯気になって浮く、など
「水滴がプレイヤーキャラ」という点が上手く活きてる。

何よりキャラクターが物凄くかわいい！！

ただ、視野が狭くて先のトラップが見えないので
基本的に「死に覚えゲー」になっている点は注意。

特に後半のステージはステージ自体が長い上に
視野の外が即死ポイントだらけで長いステージの後半で死んでは
何度もステージの最初からやり直す羽目になる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198159681106', 'num_games_owned': 604, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1490818801}
review:
En este juego tomamos el lugar de una gota de agua rebelde que decide que ya está grande para seguir en la casa de la familia. Decide ir hasta el rio que se encuentra pasando un microondas, heladera, techo, etc. Es un juego con cierta dificultad tirando a fácil lo más "difícil" es que al morir empezaremos los niveles desde cero con lo que perderemos todo el avance que habíamos conseguido en el nivel.
 
[b]NO TOMAR ENCERIO[/b]

[spoiler]Este juego tiene un gran entusiasmo al mostrarnos que si se quiere se puede, empezamos siendo una gota de agua viviente la cual tiene sobrepeso. Esta decide que no puede seguir así, es tiempo de hacer ejercicio, por el medio de caminar y dar saltos. Pero no solo trata este tema, también entra la mala alimentacion al no ingerir los alimentos necesarios mostrándonos que si no nos alimentamos bien (ingiriendo agua en el caso de ella) terminaremos muriendo.[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198133222022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1484556414}
review:
水滴が主人公になって旅をしていく２Ｄアクションゲーム

基本操作は移動とジャンプしかありませんが、
面が切り替わるごとに内装がまるっきり変わっていきます
絵が優しいタッチでかわいく描かれてるので、眺めているだけでも楽しめます。
道中のギミックで主人公が変身すると性能が変わり、操作性が変わっていきますが、
ジャンプボタンしか使わないので単純なとっつきやすさはそのままに飽きさせません

アクション好きな人や息抜きにぴったりなゲームです。
タイムアタックモードも実装されているのでやり込みたい方もおすすめ

author: {'steamid': '76561198353816972', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1489328269}
review: I die repeatedly, but I don't seem to get frustrated. I think it's because it's so dang cute. The music is very cheerful too. It gets a bit repetitious after a while, but it's something that I may just decide to play one day months down the line, and it will be very easy to just pick up and play without much thought. It's a great "mindless" game to pass the time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198337265219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1491611031}
review:
I lost count of how many times I died in level four alone, but something kept me from really getting frustrated even at the worst of times. Whether it's the wonderful aesthetic, the cute concept, or just the simple fact that the game is really fun and I don't need a reason, I don't know. Whatever it is, this game is a fun challenge, a great way to spend a couple hours, and honestly I would've been willing to pay money for more of it. 

To the devs: thank you so much for sharing this, and if you're planning on any other projects in the future then I wish you the best of luck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056698823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1484425283}
review: Drop alive is a platformer where you play as a drop of water and throughout your journey you can change into the various states of water: liquid, solid and gas. Beyound it is cute aesthetic the game is harder than it looks and most casual platform players like myself will be faced with levels where you die a good amount of times and the levels dont have checkpoints so you are put back right at the begining in the early levels into doesnt matter much since the levels are shorter but at the later levels it is a little annoying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274857590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1484428817}
review: Cute platform game, a bit short, but very good for a free game. I like the simple but effective graphics and the overall athmosphere of the game. It is original in many ways. Its a little bit hard at some places, but not too hard. Its a game you will probably complete in a couple of hours. If that is what you are looking for a late saturday night or that monday when you are in bed with a cold, then just click download and have a good run!

author: {'steamid': '76561198092118357', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1484123679}
review:
2시간 클리어.

조그마하고 귀여운 물방울이 집안부터 숲까지의 모험을 그린 게임. 그래픽이 핸드메이드 애니매이션 같은데 게임할때 매우 포근한 느낌을 준다. 또 브금도 질리지않고 경쾌하게 들리면서 진짜 내가 물방울이 된듯한 느낌을주었다. 꽤 재밌은 방식의 진행으로 우리가 모르는사이에 진짜 물방울들이 이런식으로 물의순환을 할지도 모른다는 상상을 하게해준 게임.

심심한데 가볍게 게임하고싶은 스팀러에게 추천.

무료겜인데 이정도 퀄리티는 혜자이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049176997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1484231425}
review:
If you like being in an abusive relationship, this game is for you. Let me explain. The artwork is beautiful and well made, they anthropomorphised a water droplet (really ingenious game design there, very original - you can see in the other comments how far cute anthropomorphic things can get you) and made the levels look good. So on the surface you look like your getting a good deal.
Then you get to know this game and you realise its just another trial and error re-hash of every indie trial and error before it.
Now dont get me wrong, if you enjoy getting kicked in the balls repeatedly, while coughing up blood, then yes, this game is for you. If not stay away, or just pop in for the artwork because that definitely makes it worthwhile.

All in all i would recommend it for the art but thats it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164382571', 'num_games_owned': 1104, 'num_reviews': 422, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1483982872}
review:
[i][b]Drop Alive[/b][/i] est un jeu de plate-forme d'une qualité certaine, relativement à son prix tout à fait exorbitant. Nous y incarnons une goutte d'eau qui aspire à la liberté. Pour cela, elle devra traverser la cuisine, avec entre autres le congélateur, le micro-onde et le four (oui, elle s'égare des fois), puis les égouts. La nature de cet environnement modifiera donc son état : liquide, solide ou bien gazeux, chacun d'eux ayant son lot d'avantages et d'inconvénients.

A l'état liquide, elle sera capable de grimper aux murs, mais perdra peu à peu consistance. Aussi mourra-t-elle à petit feu, à moins de trouver une source à laquelle s'alimenter. A l'état gazeux, elle s'étiole selon le même principe. En contrepartie, elle pourra voler. Enfin, à l'état solide, elle devient insensible aux dangers qui l'entourent, elle peut détruire certains obstacles et ne subira aucune perte au fil du temps, mais ne pourra que rouler, avec une maniabilité réduite. Le moindre contact avec l'eau lui fera par ailleurs reprendre forme liquide.

Sans être inoubliables, les musiques sont très entraînantes. Le jeu se boucle assez vite, car il ne comporte qu'une douzaine de niveaux : comptez entre une heure et une heure et demie - pour un prix, rappelons-le, des plus indécents ! Chacun d'eux "recèle" trois tokens, qui permettent de débloquer des skins pour les différents états de notre protagoniste. Vous trouverez par exemple un masque du chevalier du cygne pour l'état gazeux.

Si [i][b]Drop Alive[/b][/i] ne casse pas trois pattes à un canard, il propose néanmoins un gameplay sympathique, basé sur des idées intéressantes, le tout pour pas un rond.

[h1]Verdict : 3,5/5 - Ce qui est bien, mais pas top.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198019457603', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1527189831}
review:
[b]Review brought to you by[/b]:
[h1][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/34470115/]TentacleBunny's Cozy Cottage[/url][/h1]

Drop Alive is a very cute and fluffy platformer that will challenge you to have fun and have good time through all the game levels.

Drop Alive was developed by Invi Games and published by Ipsilon Developments and is accessible to everyone since it is a free to play game on Steam. 

In Drop Alive, you play as a small drop of water lost inside a big house and you have to help her get out of there through several challenging levels. It also plays away with the climate conditions and the multiple water states to help you traverse and reach the final stage of each level. You also have to collect 3 special coins on every single level to have a perfect score and sometimes those are not easy to accomplish. Especially tricky because if you die, you will have to restart the level from the very start.

Level design is simply gorgeous, the background splash art and drawings are so well made it screams cute and fun all the way. The drop itself is so likeable and makes you feel anxious every single time something bad happens to her. But the levels have satisfactory difficulty levels, from easy to actually hard ones to go through. And that variety is a strong point in the whole game.

The sounds in this game are what makes you go on cuteness overload, the drop sounds are extra cute and the environment sounds are very well made, according to each part of the levels you are in to help the immersion.

Overall, this game had me hooked from the very first level. It also has steam achievements so it is a plus. But the game itself, even tho it is a free to play game, it is totally worth your time. If you are looking for a fun yet challenging game to play for a while, try it out and you will love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018893258', 'num_games_owned': 3719, 'num_reviews': 744, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1484675296}
review:
アクションゲーム。
水滴が主人公の全12ステージのシンプルアクションゲームだ。水滴が主人公のゲームは他に"I-Fluid"などがあるが、このゲームでは水蒸気になったり氷になったりするところがユニークだ。
水滴はパンやスポンジなど水分を吸収しやすい物の上にいると、徐々に水分を吸い取られて最終的に消滅してしまう。そのため、小さくなったら水分を補給して回復させなければならない。水蒸気も常に小さくなっていくが、上昇や下降(ジャンプ操作)することができる。氷は蒸発しにくいため頑丈であるが、動きに強く慣性がかかるのが特徴となっている。
もちろんどんな状態でも炎に当たると1発でミスとなる。ミスをするとステージ最初からとなるが、ステージ1つ1つは短いので何度かプレイすればクリアできるような難易度となっている。無料であるが十分遊べる内容なのでオススメなゲームだ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198014926595', 'num_games_owned': 775, 'num_reviews': 967, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1572113208}
review:
Okay... credit where credit is due.  For a hand-made work, [i]Drop Alive[/i] is well done.  But the main reason I don't recommend it is simply because of its difficulty.

Imagine standing on surfaces too long and dying.  Imagine staying as a water drop or cloud for too long and (even when idling) shrinking until you die.  Imagine acid pools, acid fountains, and flame spouts instantly murdering you.  Of course, let's also imagine electricity and spikes that kill you instantly (sparks quickly shrinking you).  Now imagine doing all this...without checkpoints.

I get that this game is hard and I respect their decision to keep it hard...but at the same time, it harms its enjoyability.  The 100% token achievement makes it even harder.  If challenge is what you wish, good luck.  If you want an easy (or casual) 100%, you might want to look elsewhere.

4/10  A difficult experience that caused more anxiety than fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162357120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1483725095}
review:
I shall call him squishy and he shall be mine. He shall be my squishy.

Drop Alive is a bit of a mixed bag, but woth checking out for free.

Pros:
*Hand-drawn artwork and animation lend the game a plesant storybook feel. The squishy water droplet is adorable.
*The  concept and mechanics of the water shrinking, as well as changing form to steam and ice are imaginative and fantastic (when they work).
*Soundtrack is nice and unobtrusive-- I'd actually like an option to download the soundtrack and listen to it by itself.

Cons:
*Several reviewers have compared Drop Alive to Super Meat Boy, and although I understand the comparison (because of the frequent deaths), it doesn't hold up as well.
*It's a bit slow paced for the type of platformer it is; it's not puzzly enough (for my tastes) to be as slow as it is.
*Its controls are nowhere near as tight as those in SMB, and a lot of the collisions seem off. Sometimes, for example, spikes will kill you, but sometimes you can stand on them like a platform. Sometimes the drop jumps right when you want him to, but sometimes he just sort of schluffs along, to his doom. In a platformer-- especially one with so much death-- precision is key, and Drop Alive just isn't there.
*Which leads me to my final criticism-- the rage factor. Unfair feeling deaths made this game more frustrating than fun, which is at direct odds with the game's cute/relaxing aesthetic.

So come for the artwork and the concept, not for the gameplay. If that sounds like something you'd like (and I can think of worse ways to spend 45 minutes or so), give it a shot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095917598', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 1815, 'playtime_forever': 3458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1666498574}
review:
Bom vamos lá pessoal, oque dizer sobre o Drop Alive:

Breve Descrição :

Drop Alive é um jogo no estilo Plataforma/Aventura, aonde você assume o papel de um pequena gota d'água!

O jogo é se passado por fases, aonde você deve entender as mecânicas do mapa pra conseguir passar pelos desafios!

No geral, o gameplay é bem interessante, e é daqueles que você passa horas jogando sem perceber!

Pra finalizar, é Free2Play! Se você gosta de jogos de plataforma, não pense duas vezes pra baixar!

Análise:

Pontos Positivos:

* Gráficos agradaveis para o estilo do jogo.
* Mecânicas interessantes que combinam com a temática do jogo.
* Jogabilidade extremamente simples e facil de aprender.

Pontos Negativos:

* O único ponto negativo na minha opinião, é a falta de "Checkpoints" dentro das fases, para salvar o progresso. Entretando isso é bem relativo devido ao estilo de jogo.

Caso queiram dar uma olhada no jogo, segue a análise comentada !

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bEAd3M_PW3Q An amazingly novel game, where you are a water droplet and have to jump your way through a series of obstacles - essentially a level game. You take various forms, including steam. Graphically cartoony but very impressive. Humorous sounds as the water droplet gets excited or upset, depending on your gameplay. And all round fun game.

Make up your own mind with this gameplay: https://youtu.be/Kq0Wejwvmd0 A fun and frustrating experience (similar to Super Meat Boy).
It starts off smooth sailing but then things take a turn, and many many many many many deaths occur.
Risk and repeat is the formula.
Took me 1 hour to beat but there is a Time Trial Mode to play too.
If you like the sound of all this then Drop Alive is perfect for you.

The soundtrack is also fantastic.
If you happen to not know what the tokens do - they allow you to unlock different forms of the droplet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052412158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1480994542}
review:
Me encantó jugar este juego, es de los más tiernos que tuve la chance de jugar en Steam con el plus que no es fácil encontrar juegos gratuitos tan lindos y de calidad.

La idea es jugar una gotita de agua súper cute que debe moverse por diversos lugares muy peligrosos, no solo para ella sino para nosotros ya que es bastante complejo ya a partir del tercer nivel. 

La gráfica es sencilla y hermosa a la vez, con unos fondos muy clásicos y la gotita moviéndose a lo largo de la cocina y otros sitios. Es muy buena la chance de conseguir skins y vamos a poder ver a la gotita transformarse en vapor o volver a ser agua. Hay que tener cuidado de no intentar algo muchas veces ya que la gota de agua va a perder densidad y ahí perderemos el juego. Lo bueno es que siempre se puede retomar el nivel y seguir.

Agradezco a los desarrolladores por darnos esta propuesta tan bonita en todo sentido.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987751486', 'num_games_owned': 780, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1481737636}
review:
你是一滴水 
你要做的是在干涸之前到达目的地  
一路上会有重重险阻 
高温的管道和寒冷的气体会让你进行三态变化
各种各样能让你一瞬间消失的阻碍 沙地、海绵、污水、火焰、荆棘、电击
但是你不能退却
因为你知道唯有汇入更多的水才能永生
Everlasting Drop
Drop Alive

author: {'steamid': '76561197982504799', 'num_games_owned': 4252, 'num_reviews': 2873, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1481396109}
review:
Drop Alive - очень милый платформер от аргентинских разрабов, с интересным визуальным стилем, и относительно легкая +1 "идеальная игра" в профиль.

1) [u]Геймплей[/u]: играем мы за капельку чья цель выбраться из дома к своим сородичам, к воде. Сложность при этом в том, что нам надо избегать предметы которые могут впитать нашу капельку или испарить её. К примеру если упасть на хлеб, вполне можно в него впитаться и начать уровень заново, чтобы не испариться окончательно нужно вовремя найти источник воды, тогда мы вернем форму. Интересный элемент геймплея в том, что наша капелька может менять свое агрегатное состояние - если упасть на раскаленую трубу, капелька станет паром и сможет лететь вверх, но при этом будет постепенно испаряться; если попасть в холодильник, капелька станет льдинкой и перестаент иметь возможность подниматься на отвесные стены, но сможет пробивать ледянные стенки. Скины капельки и её состояний можно менять после прохождения уровней и открытия новых видов скинов. Игру вполне можно пройти меньше чем за час, если собирать все ачивки - а сложная там только одна, найти все монетки, то чуть дольше. 

2) [u]Графика и звуки[/u]: в игре очень интересный, милый и уютный визуальный стиль. Художник здесь имхо поработал на славу. Музыка приятная и расслабляющая. Все вместе выглядит довольно здорово.

[u]Как итог[/u]: очень хороший, добрый  и приятный платформер. Любителям жанра, а также любителям добрых игр рекомендую однозначно!
10 капелек из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198278001164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 4235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1492005452}
review:
Drop Alive maneja el mismo concepto del mítico (e ignorado) Dewy's Adventure para WII, una tierna gotita de agua cuyo objetivo es sobrevivir y cuidarse de los objetos que podrían secarla o romperla. La gotita no sólo aparece en su estado líquido, si no también en sólido y gaseoso, lo cuál hace que este juego tenga dinámicas muy interesantes. Es muy corto pero bastante entretenido, una joya free-to-play que muchos deberían atreverse a probar.


- Buena Jugabilidad
- Excelente apartado musical.
- Diferentes dinámicas.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198037396978', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1481329708}
review:
Bom vamos lá pessoal, oque dizer sobre o Drop Alive:

Breve Descrição :

Drop Alive é um jogo no estilo Plataforma/Aventura, aonde você assume o papel de um pequena gota d'água!

O jogo é se passado por fases, aonde você deve entender as mecânicas do mapa pra conseguir passar pelos desafios!

No geral, o gameplay é bem interessante, e é daqueles que você passa horas jogando sem perceber!

Pra finalizar, é Free2Play! Se você gosta de jogos de plataforma, não pense duas vezes pra baixar!

Análise:

Pontos Positivos:

* Gráficos agradaveis para o estilo do jogo.
* Mecânicas interessantes que combinam com a temática do jogo.
* Jogabilidade extremamente simples e facil de aprender.

Pontos Negativos:

* O único ponto negativo na minha opinião, é a falta de "Checkpoints" dentro das fases, para salvar o progresso. Entretando isso é bem relativo devido ao estilo de jogo.

Caso queiram dar uma olhada no jogo, segue a análise comentada !

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bEAd3M_PW3Q

author: {'steamid': '76561198119835199', 'num_games_owned': 616, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1604690548}
review:
[h1] 水滴くんを操作して先へ進んでいくゲーム。[/h1]
操作はADで左右、スペースでジャンプという単純なもの
ステージのオブジェクトによって水滴が当たれば吸って回復

[list]
 [*]水の状態ではコップに張り付いて壁面を登れる。[spoiler]とても死にやすい[/spoiler]
 [*]冷気によって凍り固くなったのでガラス？を破壊したり、
 [*]熱された鉄にあたって水蒸気になり、浮き上がる。
[/list]
このように状態によって異なる動きや特性があるのは、面白いと思いました。


ただ、ステージをクリアするまでは
どんなにゴールが近かろうとチェックポイントは存在せず
気を抜くと失敗して戻されるという短気な人にはお勧めできない点だと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198045381877', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 2587, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1481278121}
review: Drop Alive is a pretty fun platformer/ adventure game. You play as a drop of water on a journey, using its different states (solid, liquid, gas) to complete puzzles and get around obstacles. Simple idea but pulled of well in my opinion. I recommend it.

Lo "malo" es que es un poco corto, esperemos que agreguen más niveles, así se pueden aprovechar mejor todas las mecánicas que son muy interesantes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080781652', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2, 'last_played': 1503636902}
review:
As i said in my Deluxe Edition review, I played Drop Alive because it was free and seemed cute. It turned out to be great game, so i think the devs deserve a little collaboration. Buying the Deluxe Edition was the least i could do, and I’m glad I did, the artbook has a lot of awesome and adorable content.


The game is surprisingly difficult, something I didn’t expect, and it was a lot of fun but kinda short. Overall it took me about an hour and a half to finish it. I totally recommend that you give ir a try :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198015468267', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1481116429}
review:
A fun and frustrating experience (similar to Super Meat Boy).
It starts off smooth sailing but then things take a turn, and many many many many many deaths occur.
Risk and repeat is the formula.
Took me 1 hour to beat but there is a Time Trial Mode to play too.
If you like the sound of all this then Drop Alive is perfect for you.

The soundtrack is also fantastic.
If you happen to not know what the tokens do - they allow you to unlock different forms of the droplet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042023224', 'num_games_owned': 1596, 'num_reviews': 1033, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1481093272}
review:
물방울의 모험.

쪼끄마한 물방울을 조종하는 플래포머 게임이다. 물방울 답게 시간이 지나면 조금씩 녹아내리며 크기가 작아지고, 떨어지는 물을 받아 물방울의 크기를 키우거나, 수증기나 얼음으로 형태를 바꿀 수도 있다. 이를 이용해 게임을 진행하고 토큰을 모아나간다. 무난하다면 무난하겠지만, '물'의 특성을 적절히 활용한 게임.

플레이가 그리 편한 게임이 아니다. 아마 세 번째 스테이지인 'Warming Up'에서 크게 헤멜텐데, 하늘에서 떨어지는 물이 물방울의 크기를 키운다는 걸 깨닫지 못하면 평생 헤멜 것이고, 이걸 알고 있다 하더라도 운이 안 좋으면 꽤 많이 죽어나가게 된다. 그 밖에 여러 군데에서 레벨 디자인이 허술하다는 느낌을 받게 된다. 거기다가 도중에 죽으면 무조건 스테이지 맨 처음으로 돌아가버린다. 어차피 짧은 게임이긴 한데, 그래도 중간에 체크포인트라도 하나 만들어줬으면 정말 좋았을 것 같다.

무료 게임이라 일단 추천을 눌러두긴 하겠지만, 아주 잘 만들어졌다고 보긴 좀 어려운 게임이다. 만일 이게 유료 게임이었다면 아마 비추천을 눌렀을 것이다.

http://blog.naver.com/kitpage/220880312805

author: {'steamid': '76561198108525950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1481048909}
review:
It's an adorable little game that would probably make you hate everything that breaths.
All in all, fun game! If you're good, you might finish around 20 minutes.
